title: Watch Face Linux Terminal
summary: From The Terminal To Your Wrist ... Watch Face For Your Android Wear Device
description: View The Full Change Log and Proposed Future Updates Here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/android-wear/development/watch-linux-terminal-style-watch-t3523285View The Changed Log on Redit: https://www.reddit.com/r/androidwatchfaces/comments/5jjs8s/watchface_linux_terminal_watch_face_square_and/Watch Face Has:- Year Length Adjustment Or No Year- Font Size Adjustment- Support For Both Square, Round And Chin Watches- Displays Date And Time- Displays Battery- Watch Face Settings- Standard Linux OS Style Themes- Custom Themes- Settings That Let You Select "User" or "Root"- Settings That Let You Select "$" or "#"- (Beta) Watch Face Has a Delay Setting That Can Be Activated Through The "usr/settings" Section, This setting is still being worked on but applies a delay to the tap function in an attempt to make the "Feel" more realistic.Thank you for looking at my watch face. I hope you enjoy it.
descriptionHTML:
View The Full Change Log and Proposed Future Updates Here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/android-wear/development/watch-linux-terminal-style-watch-t3523285

View The Changed Log on Redit: https://www.reddit.com/r/androidwatchfaces/comments/5jjs8s/watchface_linux_terminal_watch_face_square_and/

Watch Face Has:
- Year Length Adjustment Or No Year
- Font Size Adjustment
- Support For Both Square, Round And Chin Watches
- Displays Date And Time
- Displays Battery
- Watch Face Settings
- Standard Linux OS Style Themes
- Custom Themes
- Settings That Let You Select "User" or "Root"
- Settings That Let You Select "$" or "#"
- (Beta) Watch Face Has a Delay Setting That Can Be Activated Through The "usr/settings" Section, This setting is still being worked on but applies a delay to the tap function in an attempt to make the "Feel" more realistic.

Thank you for looking at my watch face. I hope you enjoy it.
comments: I like the idea! Would really love it if the text was vertically aligned... It doesn't look too good on my Ticwatch E with text right at the top and lots of blank space below it.
Love it on my LG Urbane 2nd edition using 2.0!  thanks keep up the good work! Soon I'll buy the python and JavaScript watch face
Great app!! Love it and have been using it every day for a year!! Can we get an update?
Nice watchface.. But it would be cool if its possible to change user and hostname
Nice watch face, can you add one tap to get battery and weather information? Thanks
recentChanges: - Ability to customise watchface full with both colors and strings.
- Companion app now in the android wear app for full customisation.
